name: Idle Consulting
description:
A game about building your own consulting company and big numbers. Idle and incremental mechanics to keep playing for months. Explore different strategies while unlocking all the mechanics.

Features:

  • Over 50 different game objects to interact with
  • Over 150 secret achievements
  • Two different prestige mechanics
  • 12 different events and event shops
  • Events are time based, start at 5th every month until 9th
  • Optimized for mobile, tablet and desktop
  • Offline progression
  • Savegame export and import
  • Ingame statistics
